snippet: McMARTIN--John, after a brave fight, died of cancer with his companion Charlotte and his brother Jim present. Charlotte and his daughters will welcome his friends on Friday, July 8th at "The Riverside" on Amsterdam Ave. and West 76th Street, NYC, ...
lead_paragraph: McMARTIN--John, after a brave fight, died of cancer with his companion Charlotte and his brother Jim present. Charlotte and his daughters will welcome his friends on Friday, July 8th at "The Riverside" on Amsterdam Ave. and West 76th Street, NYC, from 3pm-5pm. 1/3
